channel.title: How do i make a timer for when a npc is going to spawn?
channel.description:
like i want to make a time till the next time an npc respawns after you kill it.
does anyone know how to do this?

item.title: How do i make a timer for when a npc is going to spawn?
item.dc:creator: @issac issac
item.description:
@issac wrote:

no i mean i want a timer. like on my serverpanel that counts down the seconds untill it spawns

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a timer for when a npc is going to spawn?

item.title: How do i make a timer for when a npc is going to spawn?
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

Open up your CFG file “npc.cfg” And this is the format:

// NpcID NpcName combat health respawn npc = 0 Hans 0 0 10 npc = 1 Man 2 7 30

That would be the format, so add the combat level, health, and respawn time you want.

Hope this helped

Read full topic
